Text.Page: (This book appears to be the Centurion's journal. It contains stories about an evil cult that's behind the gulas and about how the cultists brought {@LinkCreature:9#1400#Azarel's juggernaut} and {@LinkCreature:9#1410#labyrinthine stalkers} here. One particular entry stands out. It says these monsters can be defeated by pulling out their teeth.)

, you're amazing! I once received a report about the maze monster, but I wasn't sure if we could even get through its protectors.

Obviously the monster shows the level of threat we're facing, and our risk has doubled since the cultists are in cooperation with the gulas.
Did you really defeat those giant monsters?
